title: Tool Usage
description: Tool usage comprises the most common steps used in a site tool or utility, such as calculators, registrations, and requests for more information.

xdm:toolUsageCancelled.title: Tool Usage Cancelled
xdm:toolUsageCancelled.description: Captured when a visitor cancels out of a tool usage process.

xdm:toolUsageComplete.title: Tool Usage Complete
xdm:toolUsageComplete.description: Captured when a visitor successfully finishes using any type of tool or utility on the site/app.

xdm:toolUsageFailure.title: Tool Usage Failed
xdm:toolUsageFailure.description: Captured when a step in the tool usage process fails.

xdm:toolUsageID.title: Tool Usage ID
xdm:toolUsageID.description: Captures the ID of the tool process utilized, if applicable.  For example, this could be a claim, application, or booking ID, etc.

xdm:toolUsageName.title: Tool Usage Name
xdm:toolUsageName.description: Tracks the name of the tool in use.

xdm:toolUsageSaved.title: Tool Usage Saved
xdm:toolUsageSaved.description: Captured when a visitor saves and exits a tool usage process.

xdm:toolUsageStart.title: Tool Usage Start
xdm:toolUsageStart.description: Captured when a visitor initializes using any type of tool or utility on the site/app.

xdm:toolUsageStep.title: Tool Usage Step
xdm:toolUsageStep.description: Captured when any intermediary tool step is started on the site/app.

xdm:toolUsageStepName.title: Tool Usage Step Name
xdm:toolUsageStepName.description: Tracks the name of the tool step in use.

xdm:toolUsageSubmitted.title: Tool Usage Submitted
xdm:toolUsageSubmitted.description: Captured when a visitor submits data during a tool step.  Not necessarily synonymous with a successful event.

xdm:toolUsageType.title: Tool Usage Type
xdm:toolUsageType.description: Tracks the type or category of the tool in use.
